attributes.action: pass laws that enable Physical Education (P.E.) to be entirely optional at all stages of a school career.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No-one should be forced to play sport at any age as part of a national curriculum. Thus I suggest that P.E. should be optional in schools, allowing those who enjoy sport to play it and those who do not, to enjoy other social activities that are not so physically dependant.
